entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 6:35 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:35 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 6:35 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
